name: Tools
tagline: Just another repository with usefull tools
body:
##Links to common used programs

###URLS
1. [Microsoft Licensing Center] (https://www.microsoft.com/Licensing/servicecenter/default.aspx)
2. [Microsoft Azure] (https://manage.windowsazure.com)
3. [OMS Portal] (https://tega.portal.mms.microsoft.com/)
4. [CPU Benchmark] (http://www.cpubenchmark.net)
5. [Update pack W7] (http://forum.oszone.net/thread-257198.html)

###Soft

1. [Putty] (https://the.earth.li/~sgtatham/putty/latest/x86/putty.exe)
2. Kitty 
3. Victoria
4. Sysinternals
 - autoruns
 - procmon
 - procexp
5. WindirStat
6. Crystaldiskmark
7. [Classic Shell] (http://www.classicshell.net/translations/)
8. [WSUS Offline] (http://download.wsusoffline.net/)
9. [Block Windows Updates] (http://www.site2unblock.com/win-updates-disabler/)


###Chocolatey
Installation script: 

```
@powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))" && SET "PATH=%PATH%;%ALLUSERSPROFILE%\chocolatey\bin"
```

Packages for users
```
cinst -y 7zip javaruntime far foxitreader flashplayerplugin firefox adblockplusfirefox aimp ccleaner notepadplusplus googlechrome kitty.portable sysinternals
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
